import React , {useState} from 'react'; import '../../../App.css'; import './Profile.css' import Footer from '../../Footer'; import Info_Navbar from '../../Info_Navbar'; import Navbar from '../../Navbar'; import {useLocation} from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; const Profile = (props) => { const location = useLocation(); var userInfo = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("Myuser")) const [user, setUser] = useState({ hid : "" }) setUser(userInfo.ID) console.log(user); axios.post('http://localhost:3001/searchClient', user) .then(res => { alert (res.data.message) }) return ( <>
Profile
First Name
Last name
Health ID
Birth ID
NID
Date of Birth(YYYY/MM/DD)
Phone Number
Gender
Medical Information
); } export default Profile;
